Dialogs.Text: Thomas B: (Right, so... First order of bussiness is...)
Thomas B: (That's a good question, i'm trying to find a legend in this bugged as hell place.)
Thomas B: (And that's because someone blackmailed me.)
Thomas B: (Allright, calm down. If i think this carefully, maybe there is a way out of this.)
Thomas B: (Currenlty, i'm limited on the places i can go. The rest of the chat seems to be restricted by invitations...)
Thomas B: (So, in order to further investigate this place and find clues, i need to find a way to access the rest of the rooms.)
Thomas B: (And for that, i could use some help. Those Lost Media guys should be around, so maybe following them could prove useful.)
Thomas B: (Time to check if there is anybody else online.) (ADD THE REST OF THE PORTRAITS.)
